alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:50PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake County through 315 PM PDT... At 250 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Rock, or 32 miles southeast of La Pine, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
